member.name: T:Modular.Sdk.Backends.BackendCapabilities
member.summary: Feature flags declaring what capabilities a backend supports. Used by CLI to conditionally apply features like rate limiting, game domain prompting, file category filtering, etc.

member.name: F:Modular.Sdk.Backends.BackendCapabilities.None
member.summary: No special capabilities.

member.name: F:Modular.Sdk.Backends.BackendCapabilities.GameDomains
member.summary: Backend supports game domain filtering (e.g., NexusMods has skyrimspecialedition, stardewvalley). If set, CLI should prompt for game domain.

member.name: F:Modular.Sdk.Backends.BackendCapabilities.FileCategories
member.summary: Backend supports file category filtering (main, optional, update, etc.). If set, category filters can be applied to file listings.

member.name: F:Modular.Sdk.Backends.BackendCapabilities.Md5Verification
member.summary: Backend provides MD5 hashes for downloaded files. If set, downloads can be verified against expected checksums.

member.name: F:Modular.Sdk.Backends.BackendCapabilities.RateLimited
member.summary: Backend requires rate limiting to avoid API throttling. If set, rate limiter should be applied before requests.

member.name: F:Modular.Sdk.Backends.BackendCapabilities.Authentication
member.summary: Backend requires authentication (API key, login, etc.). If set, configuration validation should check for credentials.

member.name: F:Modular.Sdk.Backends.BackendCapabilities.ModCategories
member.summary: Backend supports organizing mods into category subdirectories. If set, mods can be grouped by their category ID.

member.name: T:Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.BackendMod
member.summary: Unified representation of a mod across all backends. Backend implementations map their API-specific models to this common type.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.BackendMod.ModId
member.summary: Backend-specific mod ID. Uses string to support both integer IDs (NexusMods) and string IDs (GameBanana).

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.BackendMod.Name
member.summary: Human-readable mod name.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.BackendMod.GameDomain
member.summary: Game domain or game identifier (backend-specific). For NexusMods: "skyrimspecialedition", "stardewvalley", etc. May be null for backends that don't use game domains.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.BackendMod.CategoryId
member.summary: Mod category ID, if the backend supports categories. Used for organizing mods into category subdirectories.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.BackendMod.CategoryName
member.summary: Category name, if available from the backend.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.BackendMod.BackendId
member.summary: Which backend this mod came from (e.g., "nexusmods", "gamebanana").

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.BackendMod.Url
member.summary: URL to the mod's page on the backend website.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.BackendMod.Summary
member.summary: Brief description of the mod, if available.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.BackendMod.Author
member.summary: Mod author/uploader name.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.BackendMod.UpdatedAt
member.summary: When the mod was last updated.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.BackendMod.ThumbnailUrl
member.summary: URL to a thumbnail image for the mod.

member.name: T:Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.BackendModFile
member.summary: Unified representation of a downloadable file across all backends. Backend implementations map their API-specific file models to this common type.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.BackendModFile.FileId
member.summary: Backend-specific file ID. Uses string to support both integer IDs (NexusMods) and string IDs (other backends).

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.BackendModFile.FileName
member.summary: Actual filename for saving (e.g., "MyMod-1.2.3.zip").

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.BackendModFile.DisplayName
member.summary: Human-readable display name (may differ from FileName).

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.BackendModFile.SizeBytes
member.summary: File size in bytes, if known.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.BackendModFile.Md5
member.summary: MD5 hash for verification, if the backend provides it.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.BackendModFile.Version
member.summary: File version string, if available.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.BackendModFile.Category
member.summary: File category (e.g., "main", "optional", "update", "old_version"). Used for filtering which files to download.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.BackendModFile.DirectDownloadUrl
member.summary: Pre-resolved direct download URL, if available. Some backends (GameBanana) include URLs in file listings. Others (NexusMods) require a separate API call to resolve.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.BackendModFile.UploadedAt
member.summary: When the file was uploaded/last modified.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.BackendModFile.Description
member.summary: File description or changelog, if available.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.BackendModFile.ModId
member.summary: Parent mod ID this file belongs to.

member.name: T:Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.FileFilter
member.summary: Filter options for retrieving mod files. Used to narrow down which files are returned from GetModFilesAsync.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.FileFilter.Categories
member.summary: Filter by file categories (e.g., "main", "optional"). Only files matching one of these categories will be returned. If null or empty, all categories are included.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.FileFilter.MinVersion
member.summary: Filter by file version pattern. If set, only files matching this version (or newer) are returned.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.FileFilter.UploadedAfter
member.summary: Filter by upload date. If set, only files uploaded after this date are returned.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.FileFilter.IncludeArchived
member.summary: Whether to include archived/old versions of files. Default is false (only current files).

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.FileFilter.All
member.summary: Creates an empty filter that includes all files.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.FileFilter.MainOnly
member.summary: Creates a filter for main files only.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.FileFilter.MainAndOptional
member.summary: Creates a filter for main and optional files.

member.name: T:Modular.Sdk.Backends.DownloadOptions
member.summary: Options for controlling download behavior in DownloadModsAsync.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.DownloadOptions.DryRun
member.summary: If true, show what would be downloaded without actually downloading.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.DownloadOptions.Force
member.summary: If true, re-download files even if they already exist locally.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.DownloadOptions.Filter
member.summary: Filter to apply when selecting which files to download.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.DownloadOptions.StatusCallback
member.summary: Callback for status messages during the scanning/preparation phase. Used for messages like "Fetching tracked mods..." before download progress starts.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.DownloadOptions.MaxConcurrency
member.summary: Maximum number of concurrent downloads. Default is 1 (sequential downloads).

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.DownloadOptions.VerifyDownloads
member.summary: Whether to verify downloads using MD5 checksums (if available).

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.DownloadOptions.AutoRename
member.summary: Whether to automatically rename/organize downloaded mods.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.DownloadOptions.OrganizeByCategory
member.summary: Whether to organize mods into category subdirectories.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.DownloadOptions.Default
member.summary: Creates default options for normal download behavior.

member.name: T:Modular.Sdk.Backends.DownloadProgress
member.summary: Progress information reported during download operations. Used with IProgress<DownloadProgress> to update UI.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.DownloadProgress.Status
member.summary: Current status message (e.g., "Downloading MyMod.zip").

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.DownloadProgress.Completed
member.summary: Number of items completed so far.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.DownloadProgress.Total
member.summary: Total number of items to process.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.DownloadProgress.CurrentFile
member.summary: Name of the file currently being processed, if applicable.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.DownloadProgress.CurrentFileBytes
member.summary: Bytes downloaded for the current file, if tracking file-level progress.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.DownloadProgress.CurrentFileTotalBytes
member.summary: Total bytes for the current file, if known.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.DownloadProgress.Phase
member.summary: Current phase of the download operation.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.DownloadProgress.PercentComplete
member.summary: Percentage complete (0-100), calculated from Completed/Total.

member.name: M:Modular.Sdk.Backends.DownloadProgress.Scanning(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a progress update for the scanning phase.

member.name: M:Modular.Sdk.Backends.DownloadProgress.Downloading(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a progress update for active downloading.

member.name: M:Modular.Sdk.Backends.DownloadProgress.Done(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a progress update for completion.

member.name: T:Modular.Sdk.Backends.DownloadPhase
member.summary: Phase of the download operation.

member.name: F:Modular.Sdk.Backends.DownloadPhase.Scanning
member.summary: Fetching mod lists and file information.

member.name: F:Modular.Sdk.Backends.DownloadPhase.Downloading
member.summary: Actively downloading files.

member.name: F:Modular.Sdk.Backends.DownloadPhase.Verifying
member.summary: Verifying downloaded files.

member.name: F:Modular.Sdk.Backends.DownloadPhase.Organizing
member.summary: Renaming/organizing files.

member.name: F:Modular.Sdk.Backends.DownloadPhase.Complete
member.summary: Operation complete.

member.name: T:Modular.Sdk.Backends.IModBackend
member.summary: Common interface for all mod repository backends. Each backend (NexusMods, GameBanana, CurseForge, etc.) implements this interface.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.IModBackend.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier for this backend (e.g., "nexusmods", "gamebanana"). Used as config keys, CLI subcommand names, and directory names. Must be lowercase with no spaces.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.IModBackend.DisplayName
member.summary: Human-readable display name (e.g., "NexusMods", "GameBanana"). Used in UI menus and status messages.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Backends.IModBackend.Capabilities
member.summary: Declares what features this backend supports. Used by CLI to conditionally apply rate limiting, MD5 verification, category filtering, game domain prompting, etc.

member.name: M:Modular.Sdk.Backends.IModBackend.ValidateConfiguration
member.summary: Validates that the backend is properly configured (API keys, user IDs, etc.).
member.returns: A list of validation error messages, or an empty list if configuration is valid.

member.name: M:Modular.Sdk.Backends.IModBackend.GetUserModsAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Fetches the list of mods the user has tracked/subscribed to.
member.param: Optional game domain to filter by (e.g., "skyrimspecialedition"). Only applicable for backends with GameDomains capability.

member.name: M:Modular.Sdk.Backends.IModBackend.GetModFilesAsync(System.String,System.String,Modular.Sdk.Backends.Common.FileFilter,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Fetches downloadable files for a specific mod.
member.param: The mod ID (string to support both int and string IDs).
Optional game domain (required for some backends like NexusMods).
Optional filter for categories, versions, etc.
member.returns: List of downloadable files for the mod.

member.name: M:Modular.Sdk.Backends.IModBackend.ResolveDownloadUrlAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Resolves a mod file to a direct download URL. Some backends (NexusMods) require a separate API call to get download URLs. Others (GameBanana) include URLs directly in file listings.
member.returns: The direct download URL, or null if resolution failed. Returns null for backends that provide URLs inline (check DirectDownloadUrl on BackendModFile).

member.name: M:Modular.Sdk.Backends.IModBackend.DownloadModsAsync(System.String,System.String,Modular.Sdk.Backends.DownloadOptions,System.IProgress{Modular.Sdk.Backends.DownloadProgress},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Downloads files for tracked/subscribed mods. This is the main entry point for bulk download operations.
member.param: Base directory to save downloaded files.
Optional game domain (required for backends with GameDomains capability).
Download options (dry run, force, filters, etc.).

member.name: M:Modular.Sdk.Backends.IModBackend.GetModInfoAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets mod information by ID. Useful for fetching mod name, author, etc. for display or renaming.
member.returns: Mod information, or null if not found.

member.name: T:Modular.Sdk.Installers.IModInstaller
member.summary: Interface for mod installation workflows. Plugins can implement this to provide custom installation logic.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Installers.IModInstaller.InstallerId
member.summary: Unique identifier for this installer type.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Installers.IModInstaller.DisplayName
member.summary: Display name for this installer.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Installers.IModInstaller.Priority
member.summary: Priority for installer selection (higher = preferred).

member.name: M:Modular.Sdk.Installers.IModInstaller.DetectAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Detects if this installer can handle the given archive.

member.name: M:Modular.Sdk.Installers.IModInstaller.AnalyzeAsync(System.String,Modular.Sdk.Installers.InstallContext,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Analyzes archive layout and prepares installation plan.

member.name: M:Modular.Sdk.Installers.IModInstaller.InstallAsync(Modular.Sdk.Installers.InstallPlan,System.IProgress{Modular.Sdk.Installers.InstallProgress},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Executes the installation.

member.name: T:Modular.Sdk.Installers.InstallDetectionResult
member.summary: Result of installer detection.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Installers.InstallDetectionResult.CanHandle
member.summary: Whether this installer can handle the archive.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Installers.InstallDetectionResult.Confidence
member.summary: Confidence level (0.0 - 1.0).

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Installers.InstallDetectionResult.InstallerType
member.summary: Detected installer type.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Installers.InstallDetectionResult.Reason
member.summary: Reason for detection result.

member.summary: Whether to create backups.

member.summary: Additional metadata.

member.summary: Whether user confirmation is required.

member.summary: Installation options (for installers like FOMOD).

member.summary: Source path (within archive or filesystem).

member.summary: File size in bytes.

member.summary: Whether this is a critical file.

member.summary: Type of file operation.

member.name: T:Modular.Sdk.IPluginMetadata
member.summary: Metadata describing a plugin's identity and requirements. All plugins must expose an implementation of this interface.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.IPluginMetadata.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier for the plugin (e.g., "curseforge-backend", "modrinth-backend"). Must be lowercase with no spaces. Used for plugin directory names and resolution.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.IPluginMetadata.Version
member.summary: Semantic version of the plugin (e.g., "1.0.0", "2.1.3-beta").

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.IPluginMetadata.DisplayName
member.summary: Human-readable display name (e.g., "CurseForge Backend").

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.IPluginMetadata.Author
member.summary: Plugin author name(s).

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.IPluginMetadata.Description
member.summary: Brief description of what the plugin provides.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.IPluginMetadata.MinHostVersion
member.summary: Minimum version of Modular host required to run this plugin. Format: semantic version (e.g., "1.0.0").

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.IPluginMetadata.Dependencies
member.summary: List of plugin IDs this plugin depends on (optional). Dependencies will be loaded before this plugin.

member.name: T:Modular.Sdk.Metadata.IMetadataEnricher
member.summary: Interface for enriching backend-specific metadata into canonical format. Plugins can implement this to add support for new mod backends.

member.name: P:Modular.Sdk.Metadata.IMetadataEnricher.BackendId
member.summary: Backend identifier (e.g. "nexusmods", "gamebanana").

member.name: M:Modular.Sdk.Metadata.IMetadataEnricher.EnrichAsync(System.Object,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Enriches backend-specific metadata into canonical format.

member.summary: Priority for ordering (higher = shown first).
